def sc(width,length,gaps):
    #your code here
    a, b = divmod(2*width + 2*length - 4, gaps+1)
    return 0 if b else a

def sc(w, l, g):
    return int((2*w + 2*(l-2))/(1+g)) if (2*w + 2*(l-2))%(1+g) == 0 else 0

def sc(width, length, gaps):
    land = 2 * (width - 1) + 2 * (length - 1)
    d, m = divmod(land, gaps + 1)
    return 0 if m else d

def sc(width, length, gaps):
    perimeter = 2 * (width + length - 2)
    trees, remainder = divmod(perimeter, gaps + 1)
    return remainder == 0 and trees
